title: Watch John Legend Perform La La Land's Songs at the Oscars

john legend saves la la land

text:
On the one hand, it was the best idea for John Legend to sing the La La Land medley during tonight’s Oscars telecast. On the other hand, it was the worst idea for John Legend to sing that La La Land medley, because now we’re all left to sit and ponder what a “starring John Legend” version of the movie would have looked like. Watch Legend singing “Audition (The Fools Who Dream)” above, and regret the casting that wasn’t.
